name: GD50's Tome of Infinity Knowledge.
description:
This game was made as a final project from GD50's course available at EDX. The concept is simple, the player must build a tower in order to reach the wizard's floating castle.

Credits

Awesome game assets from Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Awesome music and SFX options from: https://www.freesfx.co.uk
